Nursing & Law, RN, JD. I've worked in the U.S. for-profit healthcare system for many years and I firmly believe healthcare must be a human right for all.

Army Brat. Avid reader and teller of stories. Burner of sage. Artist. Mom of two daughters. Currently living in Southern California.

I care passionately about the environment and the climate crisis. Fascinated by the intertwined politics of nature and power.
